Report.Query: SELECT YEARMONTH AS searchdate, OWN_BUS_COUNT AS owncount, STD_BUS_COUNT AS stdcount, ADVANCED_BUS_COUNT AS advancount, AIRCON_BUS_COUNT AS aircount, LOWFLOOR_BUS_COUNT lowcount, GAS_BUS_COUNT gascount, DIESEL_BUS_COUNT diecount, CNG_BUS_COUNT cngcount, MIX_BUS_COUNT mixcount, AREA_CODE AS AreaCode, ORG_GROUP AS ParentOrgname, ORG_GROUP_ID as parentid FROM RPT_SPLYSECU_BUSINVEST
